title: Color the Classics: The Art Institute of Chicago
copy: Color the Classics lets you put your own creative spin on 30 masterpieces—including Grant Wood's American Gothic and Claude Monet's Water Lilies —that are part of the Art Institute of Chicago's vast collection. Create your own work of art by replicating the classics or add your own creative flair to masterpieces admired for centuries. Featured artists include Pablo Picasso, Georgia O'Keeffe, Katsushika Hokusai, Paul Cézanne, Claude Monet, Vincent van Gogh, Georges Seurat, Edward Hopper, Grant Wood, and many more.   64 pages, 8 x 11 in. 30 line drawings Softcover $14.99 ($13.49 members) ISBN: 978-1-492-64714-0
